description: This file defines feature flags and build configuration helpers for the application. It centralizes feature toggles such as 'useMocks' and provides logging utilities to indicate mocking mode, relying on generated build config values or fallback logic.

classes.name: FeatureFlags
classes.description: Encapsulates feature flag logic, especially related to mock mode configuration and logging.

classes.name: BuildConfigHolder
classes.description: Provides a wrapper to access build configuration flags, specifically 'USE_MOCKS', with fallback logic.

methods.name: useMocks
methods.description: Getter property that returns whether mocks are enabled based on build config or fallback.

methods.name: logMockModeIfEnabled
methods.description: Logs informational messages indicating that mock mode is active, aiding in debugging and QA.
